text: Christian Manen (3 July 1934 - 11 September 2020) was a French composer and music teacher. In 1961 he won the Premier Grand Prix de Rome with the cantata La Loreley. He worked at the Villa Medici in Rome until 1965. That same year, he began working at Conservatoire de Paris. Manen died on 11 September 2020 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:20th-century French composers Category:Academics of Paris universities Category:People from Boulogne-Billancourt
title: Christian Manen
